text: When the children of Ammon saw that they had made themselves odious to David, Hanun and the children of Ammon sent one thousand talents19:6 A talent is about 30 kilograms or 66 pounds, so 1000 talents is about 30 metric tons of silver to hire chariots and horsemen out of Mesopotamia, out of Aram-maacah, and out of Zobah.
